title: Bard Chroma Pack?
body: So bard chroma was supposed to come out patch 5.13 and its been a few days since then and we haven't gotten the bard chroma or nasus or karthus ones yet.  Why are they not out yet?????

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Not all content for a patch is released the first day the new patch is out. Content is usually released throughout the patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=NZKAEYva,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-13T16:38:00.723+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Not all content for a patch is released the first day the new patch is out. Content is usually released throughout the patch.

I was really hoping the Chroma would have been for his Elderwood Skin, I really enjoy the look of it but the colors just seem off to me. Do you think a request could be made for an Elderwood Bard Chroma pack?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=NZKAEYva,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-13T16:38:00.723+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Not all content for a patch is released the first day the new patch is out. Content is usually released throughout the patch.

Gentleman Gnar just came out, are we to expect the Chromas soon? I'm sitting on just enough RP for it and I'm ready to get some blood red meeps flying.
I have a feeling they are waiting for the Zed fix, because he has a Chroma pack coming at the same time (and it would be awkward to release a chroma for a disabled champion).
Zeds chroma was pushed back to patch 5.14 (Or scraped idk) but the Nasus/Karthus/Bard chroma are due to come out sometime during this patch as well as gentlemen gnar.

Oh right, I remember now. Nevermind then.

Still waiting on the Bard chroma and Gentleman Gnar myself :3

Yeah, Zed is another patch...

Bard and gentlemen gnar are what this patch is all about ;)
